title: Romantic clip of elderly man meeting his wife at airport steals hearts
text:
Romantic clip of elderly man meeting his wife at airport steals hearts Last updated 09:54, September 10 2015 YouTube 
The clip has had over 60 Million views across the internet. 
A romantic clip of an elderly man, meeting his love with flowers at an airport, has captured the hearts of social media. 
It's hard not to be hit by a case of the warm fuzzies as the clip - captured in secret - shows the elderly man at the Van Nuys Flyway at Los Angeles LAX airport, patiently waiting for his love to arrive 
Dressed smartly and holding a bunch of flowers, the man shuffles nervously before a hugh smile lights his face as he sees his love coming out of the gate. 
The couple then enjoy a hug and kiss as onlookers watch on. 
The video was uploaded to YouTube by a user posting under the name Valerie Jane, and reported in the Daily Mail. 
Jane can be heard squealing with delight as the man pulls his love in for a kiss. YouTube 
Sweet embrace: Elderly man captures hearts as he waits for his love to arrive at LAX airport. 
The clip has since appeared all over the internet, and has now been viewed over 60 million times. 
In a note accompanying the original uploading of the video, Jane explained the scenario. 
"As I was waiting to get onto the bus at Van Nuys Flyaway, I notice this old man standing with roses and chocolates in his hand waiting for his wife to come from the airport. This shows the epitome of love. 
Romantic older man waits for his wife at airport 
"My heart melted and it showed me that this kind of love exists. Hopefully these two lovely people who are in the video can see this." 
The identity of the cute couple is not known, but it is a nice reminder that true love really can last a lifetime. 
Have you ever had romantic moment at the airport? Tell us about it in the comments below.
